name: Secret
description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their secret.

name: Information
description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their information.

name: Other People
description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you their other people section for the character of your choice.

name: Defend
description: If someone uses an ability on you that forces you to reveal your information or secret, show this power to them and keep your information or secret hidden instead.

name: Pickpocket
description: Talk to an Organiser and specify a player and an item. If the player has such an item, you will steal it from them. If the player doesnâ€™t, you will steal an item at random.

name: Reveal
description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player must show you all items they have on them.

name: Attack
description: Do something specific. If you manage this, the player is knocked out.

name: Special
description: Do something specific. If you manage this something special happens
